popup_auto_resolution.message: When Changing status of issue to completed, automatically set the completion reason to fixed

popup_extend_desc.message: Extend description of issue on Add/Edit Issue

popup_clear_notified_users.message: Show button for clearing notified users

popup_paste_file_from_clipboard.message: Paste image from clipboard at Comment Editor of View Issue

popup_customized_issue_list.message: Rearrange columns in search result of issues

popup_total_time.message: Show total estimated and actual hours on search result of issues

popup_backlog_card.message: Show issue card from issue key

popup_draggable_gantt.message: Support drag & drop for Gantt chart

popup_copy_wiki.message: Copy wiki page to other project

popup_child_page.message: Input parent page name automatically when creating new page

popup_plantuml.message: Show PlantUML(Send UML data to plantuml.com)

popup_hr.message: Show horizontal rule with Backlog syntax("---" or "___")

popup_user_switcher.message: Show user switcher on personal Gantt

popup_dashboard_gantt_link.message: Show link for gantt on my issues
